name.fr: L'abus de grog est dangereux pour votre santé
name.en: Too Much Grog Is Bad for Your Health
name.es: Si bebe grog, hágalo con moderación
name.pt: O uso abusivo de grogue é prejudicial à saúde

description.fr: Vaincre tous les Bworks. \--- Lorsqu'un Bwork attaque\_: Se téléporte autour de la {ObjectMechanism:1248!}.
description.en: Defeat all the Bworks. \--- When a Bwork attacks: Teleports to around\_ the {ObjectMechanism:1248!}.
description.es: Vencer a todos los bworks. \--- Cuando un bwork ataca: Se teletransporta alrededor de la {ObjectMechanism:1248!}.
description.de: Alle Bworks besiegen. \--- Wenn ein Bwork angreift: Teleportiert sich afu ein Feld ringsum\_ von {ObjectMechanism:1248!}.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Bworks. \--- Quando um Bwork ataca: Teletransporta-se em\_volta\_ do {ObjectMechanism:1248!}.
